downloadTitle: Using your PIN to access work resources
downloadDescription: The Microsoft Passport for Work feature for Windows 10 Enterprise will help you to securely log onto your PC and enjoy simplified sign on to on premise and cloud resources without using a password. Using Windows Hello, you can log onto your Windows 10 devices with just a look or a touch if your device is equipped with compatible hardware.
detailsSection: The Microsoft Passport for Work feature for Windows 10 Enterprise will help you to securely log onto your PC and enjoy simplified sign on to on premise and cloud resources without using a password. Using Windows Hello, you can log onto your Windows 10 devices with just a look or a touch if your device is equipped with compatible hardware.
